channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: The Gardener And Friends
channel.desc: Tanya makes a colourful decorative wall-hanging, we explore a layered designer garden, Phindile shares shelf-friendly indoor plants, and XO shows easy ways to grow tasty homegrown veggies.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Dream Homes Revealed
channel.desc: Today on the show we will be looking at homes designed and built by their owners. We will discover the journey these builders and architects went on while creating their own dream home.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: The House JK Built
channel.desc: Sir John Kirwan and his wife Fiorella embark on an ambitious home design journey and decide to either renovate or completely demolish their family holiday home.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Find Me A Beach House
channel.desc: Michael and Jade are looking for their dream beach home in beautiful Byron Bay in northern New South Wales. They are enjoying early retirement and want to be close to the beach.
